content:
Test Document for Formatting Issues

You can choose to set any project to Autostart mode by activating the Enable Autostart option.

This sentence has bold words in the middle and should work perfectly.

Here is a sentence with a helpful link that should not break.

This sentence contains an image reference 176617096203-d2e2393 that should not split.

Bold text at start of sentence works fine.

Multiple formatting: you can use bold text, add links, and reference images 12345-abcde in one sentence.

feedback.message: Punctuation issue: Sentence may be missing ending punctuation

feedback.message: Accessibility issue: Generic link text - use descriptive link text
Clarity issue: Vague pronoun reference - specify what "this/that/it" refers to
